amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to manageable Federal student loan repayment options.

vote.text: Amendment SA 622 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 622 proposed by Senator Burr. (consideration: CR S1838-1839, S1842; text: CR S1838) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to manageable Federal student loan repayment options.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 622 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 622 proposed by Senator Burr.
